title: Video: Work Drugs – Blue Steel
content: Philadelphia duo Work Drugs are some of the hardest working guys around, constantly churning out top quality, insanely danceable tracks. New single Blue Steel is no exception, with plenty of 80’s pop inspiration dominating the track, even featuring a Video Killed The Radio Star breakdown halfway through. The video is comprised solely of clips from 1987 rom-com Mannequin; so it’s no surprise to learn that there’s an abundance of flirtatious dancing and slightly questionable, dated moves. Check out the video below and head over to Work Drugs bandcamp to grab their new album Aurora Lies, out November 7.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
